product_name: Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Wide-Mouth Loop-Cap Water Bottle - 40 fl. oz.
long_description: A great size for road trips and treks into the mountains, the 40 fl. oz. Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Wide-Mouth water bottle with loop-top cap and brushed stainless finish keeps you hydrated.
short_description: A great size for road trips and treks into the mountains, the 40 fl. oz. Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Wide-Mouth water bottle with loop-top cap and brushed stainless finish keeps you hydrated.
